meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>fingers</radical> told you that a <radical>flood</radical> last <radical>evening</radical> would <kanji>draw close</kanji>. There was nothing you could do to stop it, it seemed to be <kanji>be imminent</kanji>, coming in the darkness of the evening.
readingMnemonic: Luckily whenever you sense a flood starting to <kanji>draw close</kanji>, <reading>Satsu</reading>ki (さつ) prepares a raft. Remember Satsuki? Such a talented little girl. I guess floods are common enough that she's learned to make rafts?
